price: 87 Mais ton Seigneur, par un effet de Sa miséricorde, t’en a préservé, Lui qui t’a comblé de tant de faveurs.
arabic: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: illā raḥmatan min rabbika inna faḍlahu kāna ʿalayka kabīran
